alert.note: Alert for Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:07PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fremont County through 400 PM MDT... At 307 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canon City, or 26 miles north of Junkins Burn Scar, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Winds will extend well away from any precipitation. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Canon City around 315 PM MDT. Penrose around 325 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Florence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft
